data.title: HTML5
data.description: A comprehensive guide to learning HTML5, the latest version of the HTML standard, covering essential topics and best practices.

items.title: Introduction to HTML5
items.description: Learn what HTML5 is, its significance, and the basic structure of an HTML5 document, including essential elements like doctype, html, head, and body.

items.title: Basic Elements and Tags
items.description: Understand the fundamental HTML5 elements and tags, including headings, paragraphs, links, images, and lists, which form the backbone of web content.

items.title: Forms
items.description: Explore HTML5 form elements, such as input fields, labels, buttons, and different input types, to create interactive and user-friendly web forms.

items.title: Multimedia
items.description: Discover how to integrate multimedia elements like audio and video into your web pages using HTML5's audio and video tags, enhancing the user experience.

items.title: Semantics
items.description: Learn about HTML5 semantic elements like header, nav, section, article, footer, and aside, which improve the structure and accessibility of web content.

items.title: Global Attributes
items.description: Understand global attributes that can be applied to most HTML5 elements, such as id, class, style, and title, to enhance the functionality and styling of web pages.
